message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value and features, I'm asking for $22,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.

Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I think $22,000 is a bit too high. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and features.
Bob, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your interest.  While $22,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $20,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.

Hi Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $17,500 for the product. I think this is a more reasonable price considering its value and features.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  To get this deal done, I'm willing to accept $19,000.  This is my final offer.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $19,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $16,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value and features.
Bob, I'm sensing we're getting close.  $18,500 and we have a deal.  This is my absolute bottom line.
Hi Alice, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $16,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering its value and features.
